document_data.mainbody:
erremo Magli was an assassin and the chief servant of the green dragon, Andareunarthex.
The blonde-haired Ferremo liked to wear nice clothes because he found it made him less noticeable than clothing favored by most assassins.
In 1479 DR, Magli helped kidnap Nazra Mrayss young son so Andarenarthex could extort the Dragonstaff from Nazra.
During his rescue of Clytemorrenestrix, Tennora Hedare killed Magli in Andareunarthexs hideout.
